page.title: 11Living in Wideopen
page.content: I like living in{Wideopen }because it's got a lot of playing fields and the park. You can play football or cricket almost anywhere. In Lockey Park at Wideopen there is an old steam train and a climbing frame. I like the playscheme and going up the old railway line on my bike. My bike is a{ {B.M.X. Barbican.}You can do things like wheelies, back hops, front hops, endos, caterpillars and bunnyhops, on the ground, that is. On a quarter pipe you can do ariels, kick turns, drop ins and cross ups. I can't do all these yet because I am only nine {B.M.X.}stands for{British Motor Cross I also like the way the village is friendly. You meet someone you know nearly everytime you go down the street.
